thread.title: Tokyo stocks close 0.42% higher
thread.title_full: Tokyo stocks close 0.42% higher | Business Spectator

author: AFP
title: Tokyo stocks close 0.42% higher
text:
Tokyo stocks have staged a modest rebound, with the benchmark index closing up 0.42 per cent as investors jumped back into the market after a China-linked sell-off the previous day.
The Nikkei 225 index at the Tokyo Stock Exchange rose 75.92 points to finish at 18,207.15, while the broader Topix index of all first-section shares gained 0.30 per cent, or 4.53 points, to 1,499.28.
